Remark part 1: Montenegro was formerly part of former entries: YUGOSLAVIA (YU, YUG, 891) then SERBIA AND MONTENEGRO (CS, SCG, 891). The language code "001" corresponds to the language Montenegrin.
Remark part 2: The language code "001" corresponds to the language Montenegrin.
Remark part 3: Serbia and Montenegro (CS, SCG, 891) was divided into Serbia (RS, SRB, 688) and Montenegro (ME, MNE, 499). See also code element CSXX.
